title: S9E015 – "Dead Ends" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
Otis serves up two slices of terror from Ryan Peacock. In the first story, a successful businessman goes to take care of the only thing that could stand in the way of a long and happy retirement...but he may not like the consequences. In the second, an elderly man's attempt to stave off boredom by attaching a camera to his wandering feline leads to a revelation he may have been better off not knowing.

To watch the podcast on YouTube: http://bit.ly/ChillingEntertainmentYT


Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or by using this link: http://bit.ly/ScaryStoriesPodcast


If you like the show, telling a friend about it would be amazing! You can text, email, Tweet, or send this link to a friend: http://bit.ly/ScaryStoriesPodcast



Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
